Idris Exercises

Author: Jonathon P. Henry

CPS 452: Emerging Programming Languages, Fall 2019:

Assigned:
Due:

Total points: ... points

Isidore | Style guide | Academic Integrity | Evaluation Criteria

  1. (5 points)
    Write a function to mirror a matrix horizontally.
  2. (10 points)
    Write a data type to hold the pixels in a display, taking into account color and size.
  3. (5 points)
    Prove the commutative property of addition.
